content: Very interesting @Thorsten Altenkirch! Will this only be hosted on youtube, or will there be an RSS feed too?

I hope there is an audio version, but in my rss reader I can use the link with the channel id to get updates. The url looks like:

https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xmlchannel_id=UC1qef_JbDxWTAkFpPWCnhzA
In the moment we only post on youtube but we consider adding RSS feeds.
Seconding on RSS; would love to add this to my podcast feed

We’re going live on podcast platforms today as well.
Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, and Deezer are picked up automatically. For other platforms from the attached list, registration can be done quickly if needed.

Let us know if you have any favourite platforms you’d like us to add.

And yes — the RSS feed is live, so you can also subscribe directly and bypass the usual surveillance-capitalism corporations :wink:
https://aboutlogic.podigee.io/feed/mp3
